name: Finisterre Capital LLP
bossPosition: Partner, General Counsel and Chief Compliance Officer
goal: Finisterre Capital (“Finisterre”) is a global alternative asset management company with offices in the UK, Malta and the U.S. Established in 2002, we manage capital in fixed-income markets, with an emphasis on emerging markets, across a suite of Hedge Fund and regulated products
interests: Budget, Economy, finance and the euro, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: We follow EU policies in the context of our professional activities. We are interested in learning how policymaking will impact economic conditions in the economies we are active in (developed and emerging markets).
